CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 9, 1946, pg. 17, reads: "FOOTBALL FANS - Smoky City hospitality last Sunday were two charming young ladies from Washington, D. C. who attended the Steelers - Redskins game. Mrs. Ernestine Chichester, left, and Mrs. Bethesda Swann, right, are shown with a Pittsburgher, Mrs. Pauline Hall.  The visitors stopped with Mr. and Mrs. Edward English of Sterrett Street. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Ernestine Chichester wearing trousers on left, Pauline Hall, and Bethesda Swann, posed around floral chair in living room with photographs and bookcases with leaded glass doors
